# Test Commands for VLA System
# Use these commands to test voice-to-action pipeline

# Navigation Commands
navigate to the kitchen
go to the living room
move to the bedroom
return to home position

# Manipulation Commands
pick up the red mug
grasp the book
grab the bottle
place the object on the table
put down the item

# Perception Commands
find the blue cup
detect objects on the table
look for the remote control
search for the keys

# Multi-Step Tasks
bring me the book from the shelf
prepare the room for a meeting
clean the living room
fetch the mug from the kitchen
open the door and enter

# Complex Tasks
arrange the chairs around the table
clear the table surface
organize the books on the shelf
set the table for dinner
tidy up the workspace

# Error Cases (test robustness)
navigate to the moon
pick up the invisible object
do a backflip
solve world hunger
